verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הִנָּבֵ֛א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against נְבִיאֵ֥י <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei against the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הַנִּבָּאִ֑ים <WH5012> han-nib-ba-'Im; that prophesy וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say לִנְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> lin-vi-'Ei thou unto them that prophesy מִלִּבָּ֔ם <WH3820> mil-lib-Bam, out of their own hearts שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- ye the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD ה֖וֹי <WH1945> Ho Woe עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im prophets הַנְּבָלִ֑ים <WH5036> han-ne-va-Lim; unto the foolish אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הֹלְכִ֛ים <WH1980> ho-le-Chim along אַחַ֥ר <WH310> 'a-Char after that רוּחָ֖ם <WH7307> ru-Cham their own spirit וּלְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> u-le-vil-Ti nothing רָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> ra-'U. and have seen

כְּשֻׁעָלִ֖ים <WH7776> ke-shu-'a-Lim are like the foxes בָּחֳרָב֑וֹת <WH2723> bo-cho-ra-Vot; in the deserts נְבִיאֶ֥יךָ <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei-cha thy prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El O Israel הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> ha-Yu. have been

לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo nor עֲלִיתֶם֙ <WH5927> 'a-li-Tem Ye have not gone up בַּפְּרָצ֔וֹת <WH6556> bap-pe-ra-Tzot, into the gaps וַתִּגְדְּר֥וּ <WH1443> vat-tig-de-Ru neither made up גָדֵ֖ר <WH1447> ga-Der the hedge עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- around בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit for the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> la-'a-Mod to stand בַּמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> bam-mil-cha-Mah in the battle בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

חָ֤זוּ <WH2372> Cha-zu They have seen שָׁוְא֙ <WH7723> shaV vanity וְקֶ֣סֶם <WH7081> ve-Ke-sem divination כָּזָ֔ב <WH3577> ka-Zav, and lying הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> ha-'o-me-Rim saying נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, The LORD וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo has not שְׁלָחָ֑ם <WH7971> she-la-Cham; hath not sent וְיִֽחֲל֖וּ <WH3176> ve-yi-cha-Lu them and they have made [others] to hope לְקַיֵּ֥ם <WH6965> le-kai-Yem that they would confirm דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> da-Var. the word

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo not מַֽחֲזֵה־ <WH4236> ma-cha-zeh- vision שָׁוְא֙ <WH7723> shaV a vain חֲזִיתֶ֔ם <WH2372> cha-zi-Tem, Have ye not seen וּמִקְסַ֥ם <WH4738> u-mik-Sam divination כָּזָ֖ב <WH3577> ka-Zav a lying אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH1696> 'a-mar-Tem; and have ye not spoken וְאֹֽמְרִים֙ <WH559> ve-'o-me-Rim whereas ye say נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, The LORD וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not דִבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti. answer ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because דַּבֶּרְכֶ֣ם <WH1696> dab-ber-Chem Because ye have spoken שָׁ֔וְא <WH7723> Shav, vanity וַחֲזִיתֶ֖ם <WH2372> va-cha-zi-Tem and seen כָּזָ֑ב <WH3577> ka-Zav; lies לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem, I am against נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um therefore behold I [am] against you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD

וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah will have יָדִ֗י <WH3027> ya-Di, And mine hand אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- will be against הַנְּבִיאִ֞ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im shall be upon the prophets הַחֹזִ֣ים <WH2374> ha-cho-Zim that see שָׁוְא֮ <WH7723> shaV vanity וְהַקֹּסְמִ֣ים <WH7080> ve-hak-ko-se-Mim and that divine כָּזָב֒ <WH3577> ka-Zav lies בְּס֧וֹד <WH5475> be-Sod they shall not be in the assembly עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> 'am-Mi of my people לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no יִהְי֗וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu, place וּבִכְתָ֤ב <WH3791> u-vich-Tav in the writing בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <WH3789> yik-ka-Te-vu, neither shall they be written וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- will be against אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor יָבֹ֑אוּ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u; neither shall they enter וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. GOD

יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an is definitely וּבְיַ֜עַן <WH3282> u-ve-Ya-'an because הִטְע֧וּ <WH2937> hit-'U Because even because they have seduced אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֛י <WH5971> 'am-Mi my people לֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> le-Mor saying שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom Peace וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein is no שָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom; and [there was] no peace וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hu anyone בֹּ֣נֶה <WH1129> Bo-neh and one built up חַ֔יִץ <WH2434> Cha-yitz, a wall וְהִנָּ֛ם <WH2009> ve-hin-Nam and lo טָחִ֥ים <WH2902> ta-Chim others daubed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To תָּפֵֽל׃ <WH8602> ta-Fel. it with untempered

אֱמֹ֛ר <WH559> 'e-Mor Say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about טָחֵ֥י <WH2902> ta-Chei unto them which daub תָפֵ֖ל <WH8602> ta-Fel [it] with untempered וְיִפֹּ֑ל <WH5307> ve-yip-Pol; [morter] that it shall fall הָיָ֣ה׀ <WH1961> ha-Yah will come גֶּ֣שֶׁם <WH1653> Ge-shem shower שׁוֹטֵ֗ף <WH7857> sho-Tef, there shall be an overflowing וְאַתֵּ֜נָה <WH859> ve-'at-Te-nah and ye אַבְנֵ֤י <WH68> 'av-Nei stones אֶלְגָּבִישׁ֙ <WH417> 'el-ga-Vish great hail תִּפֹּ֔לְנָה <WH5307> tip-Po-le-nah, shall fall וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach wind סְעָר֖וֹת <WH5591> se-'a-Rot and a stormy תְּבַקֵּֽעַ׃ <WH1234> te-vak-Ke-a'. shall rend

וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh Behold נָפַ֣ל <WH5307> na-Fal is fallen הַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> hak-Kir; Lo when the wall הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> ha-lO not יֵאָמֵ֣ר <WH559> ye-'a-Mer shall it not be said אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem, about אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where הַטִּ֖יחַ <WH2915> hat-Ti-ach unto you Where [is] the daubing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which טַחְתֶּֽם׃ <WH2902> tach-Tem. wherewith ye have daubed ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD וּבִקַּעְתִּ֥י <WH1234> u-vik-ka'-Ti I will even rend רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> Ru-ach- wind סְעָר֖וֹת <WH5591> se-'a-Rot [it] with a stormy בַּֽחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> ba-cha-ma-Ti; in my fury וְגֶ֤שֶׁם <WH1653> ve-Ge-shem shower שֹׁטֵף֙ <WH7857> sho-Tef and there shall be an overflowing בְּאַפִּ֣י <WH639> be-'ap-Pi in mine anger יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh, become וְאַבְנֵ֥י <WH68> ve-'av-Nei stones אֶלְגָּבִ֖ישׁ <WH417> 'el-ga-Vish great hail בְּחֵמָ֥ה <WH2534> be-che-Mah in [my] fury לְכָלָֽה׃ <WH3617> le-cha-Lah. to consume

וְכִלֵּיתִ֤י <WH3615> ve-chil-lei-Ti Thus will I accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> cha-ma-Ti my wrath בַּקִּ֔יר <WH7023> bak-Kir, upon the wall וּבַטָּחִ֥ים <WH2902> u-vat-ta-Chim and upon them that have daubed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To תָּפֵ֑ל <WH8602> ta-Fel; it with untempered וְאֹמַ֤ר <WH559> ve-'o-Mar [morter] and will say לָכֶם֙ la-Chem אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein is gone הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> hak-Kir, unto you The wall וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> ve-'Ein are gone הַטָּחִ֥ים <WH2902> hat-ta-Chim [is] no [more] neither they that daubed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.

נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei [To wit] the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַֽנִבְּאִים֙ <WH5012> ha-nib-be-'Im which prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, concerning Jerusalem וְהַחֹזִ֥ים <WH2374> ve-ha-cho-Zim and which see לָ֖הּ lah חֲז֣וֹן <WH2377> cha-Zon visions שָׁלֹ֑ם <WH7965> sha-Lom; of peace וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein there שָׁלֹ֔ם <WH7965> sha-Lom, for her and [there is] no peace נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah now you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Likewise thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man שִׂ֤ים <WH7760> sim set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> be-Not against the daughters עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha, of thy people הַמִּֽתְנַבְּא֖וֹת <WH5012> ham-mit-nab-be-'ot which prophesy מִֽלִּבְּהֶ֑ן <WH3820> mil-lib-be-Hen; out of their own heart וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hen. against
